author: Amazon Customer "music lover"

review: i really enjoy the fire TV stick! As soon as I connected the device a video popped up showing me how to use it and my options to have a free prime trial. I also was able to connect it to my Netflix and pandora accounts. It's totally worth the money. The only thing I advise to consider before you purchase this product is to make sure you have a good wifi connection and that you are not sharing it with a lot of people (as in free wifi at an hotel or something) because it could slow it down. If im out of town I turn the hotspot on my phone. I really enjoy this device and it is so small! It's easy to hide the one cord and so easy to set up! I'm very very pleased with my purchase!
